DOC.brief_summary: To examine safety efficacy response guide triple therapy ( PEG-IFN , Ribavirin , Telaprevir ) treatment early chronic Hepatitis C Virus ( HCV ) infection .
DOC.brief_title: DAA Based Therapy Recently Acquired Hepatitis C ( DARE-C )
DOC.detailed_description: DARE-C prospective open label multi-centre pilot study examine safety efficacy response guide triple therapy ( PEG-IFN , Ribavirin Telaprevir ) treatment early chronic HCV genotype 1 infection individual without HIV infection .
